short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows collapsing and expading threads in the orange site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds additional functionality to hacker news comment pages (i.e https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=25713858) so comments can be collapsed and expanded in a better way from the client side. 

What it does exactly is providing two new functionalities:

- A button next o the "add comment" which expands and collapses all parent
- A [*] anchor next to each comment that only expands and collapses the comment three of that thread. 

Check the plugin screenshot to see how it looks.
